hero.copy: Take on heavy, deep and wet snow with the Cub Cadet engine advantage. Available with IntelliPower™ and electronic fuel injection (EFI) engine technology, a Cub Cadet engine helps you get the job done.

intellipower.text: Power that rises to the occasion.

stats.copy: <sup>*</sup>When compared to the same engine without IntelliPower™ technology, improvements vary depending on engine models and specific operating conditions.

blocks.line3: IntelliPower™ engine technology provides up to 18% more power for 243cc EGOV with a digital throttle control that consistently optimizes engine output.<sup>*</sup>
IntelliPower™ engine technology provides up to 13% more power for 272cc EGOV with a digital throttle control that consistently optimizes engine output.<sup>*</sup>
IntelliPower™ engine technology provides up to 12% more power for 357cc EGOV with a digital throttle control that consistently optimizes engine output.<sup>*</sup>

blocks.title: Consistent Power
blocks.copy: Designed to deliver consistent power in conditions with heavy, deep and wet snow.

blocks.title: Consistent Results
blocks.copy: By digitally optimizing engine output to help provide a smooth and consistent experience in challenging conditions.

blocks.title: PHASE 1
blocks.copy: Your onboard computer senses challenging elements as your engine begins to bog down.

blocks.title: PHASE 2
blocks.copy: IntelliPower™ automatically increases engine RPMs, offering you more available power resulting in less bogging down when clearing heavy and wet snow.<sup>*</sup>

blocks.title: Awesome performance and features!
blocks.copy: “First year with new Cub Cadet has been very impressive. Easy to start, steering feature works great, snow clearing and throwing was excellent. Snow was very wet and heavy but blower had no problem.”
blocks.name: Big R, Rochester NY

blocks.title: High Quality!
blocks.copy: “I am really enjoying this new snow blower! It is very high quality and very easy to use. I would strongly recommend.”
blocks.name: Ndwest, Bismarck ND

blocks.title: Cuts like butter
blocks.copy: “This snow blower is a beast! We got a storm that dropped two feet of pure powder on us. The snow blower went through it like a hot knife through butter and no bogging at all!”
blocks.name: NJsnowstorm New Jersey

blocks.title: Starts with ease
blocks.copy: “I’ve had lots of other equipment without an EFI and they are a nightmare to start. This snow blower starts with one pull every time.”
blocks.name: MSDComp08022 East Fishkill, NY

efi.copy: Cub Cadet electronic fuel-injected (EFI) engines set new standards in strength and power. EFI provides reliable starting, and IntelliPower™ technology offers more available power when you need it most.<sup>*</sup>
efi.small: *When compared to the same engine without IntelliPower™ technology, improvements vary depending on engine models and specific operating conditions

blocks.title: Easy to Start
blocks.copy: Quick startups and no need to prime or choke, just turn the key to start.

blocks.title: Easy Storage
blocks.copy: Simple off-season storage by eliminating the need to drain the fuel tank.

justInCase.title: Fuel Efficient
justInCase.copy: EFI uses up to 25% less fuel versus standard  carbureted engines, so fewer emissions or fuel-ups.

efiBlock.h2: Electronic Fuel Injection (EFI) Takes on the Job

learnMore.h2: Learn More about Cub Cadet IntelliPower™ and EFI

blocks.title: IntelliPower™
blocks.copy: Cub Cadet® snow blowers are engineered for extreme. The 2X® 30 EFI with IntelliPower™ combines two technologies — IntelliPower and Electronic Fuel Injection (EFI) — to give you a powerful combination and help handle whatever winter has to offer.

blocks.title: Electronic Fuel Injection
blocks.copy: If you’ve ever had to tackle winter, you understand the necessity of packing as much power as you can to take on the season’s extremes. As the temperature drops, you need to get your snow blower prepared so you can keep up with the anticipated snowfall.

viewMore.h2: View Cub Cadet Products with IntelliPower and EFI

blocks.title: 2X 24” INTELLIPOWER™ Snow Blower
blocks.copy: 2X™ TWO-STAGE POWER

blocks.title: 2X 26” INTELLIPOWER™ Snow Blower
blocks.copy: 2X™ TWO-STAGE POWER

blocks.title: 2X 26” TRAC INTELLIPOWER™ Snow Blower
blocks.copy: 2X™ TWO-STAGE POWER

blocks.title: 2X 28” INTELLIPOWER™ Snow Blower
blocks.copy: 2X™ TWO-STAGE POWER

blocks.title: 2X 30” EFI Snow Blower
blocks.copy: 2X™ TWO-STAGE POWER

intellipower.question: What is IntelliPower?
intellipower.answer: This engine technology electronically controls engine speed to create consistent mowing performance for users that might be challenged to cut through thick, wet heavy grass by delivering more power from the engine to the blades resulting in a Signature Cut™ every time.

intellipower.question: How does IntelliPower work?
intellipower.answer: IntelliPower technology has various electronic inputs that measure engine speed and temperature, which allows an onboard computer to digitally control the throttle position to maintain engine speed without the operator noticing. This prevents the engine from bogging down in challenging conditions, improving performance in heavy, wet grass, while mulching, bagging, or side discharging.

intellipower.question: How does IntelliPower benefit me?
intellipower.answer: A decrease in engine speed means a decrease in blade speed, which leads to an uneven cut, or the unit stalling out. When you engage IntelliPower, you are digitally maintaining your engine speed, giving you up to 20% more available power* that you can feel and hear.

intellipower.question: How do I know if my unit has electronic governing?
intellipower.answer: Just look for IntelliPower, which is exclusive to Cub Cadet and featured on our snow blowers and walk behind/ride-on mowers.

intellipower.question: Where is the throttle cable?
intellipower.answer: An engine with IntelliPower is controlled with an electronic speed selector that allows the user to pick any speed that they require. Say goodbye to physical choke and throttle cables.

intellipower.question: Does the IntelliPower feature require any maintenance?
intellipower.answer: No. The IntelliPower feature is controlled by an onboard computer that requires no additional maintenance throughout the life of the engine. In fact, this feature requires less components than a standard mechanical governed engine.

intellipower.question: Do Cub Cadet IntelliPower engines accept E85?
intellipower.answer: No. E85 is a blend of gasoline containing mostly ethanol (85% ethanol and 15% gasoline). Operating the engine with E15 or E85 fuel may result in damage to your engine’s carburetor.

intellipower.question: Do Cub Cadet IntelliPower engines accept diesel fuel?
intellipower.answer: No. Use automotive gasoline (unleaded or low leaded to minimize combustion chamber deposits) with a minimum of 87 octane.

efi.question: What is EFI?
efi.answer: Electronic fuel injection (EFI) is a high-pressure fuel management system. Just like on today’s cars, EFI uses an onboard computer, injector nozzle and multiple sensors to reliably deliver exactly the right amount of fuel to get the most performance and efficiency out of your engine. Cub EFI is an advanced electronically controlled system that uses real-time feedback to sense usage conditions an instantly optimize combustion to give you smooth running and exceptional starting you can count on, no matter what.

efi.question: How does EFI work?
efi.answer: EFI, or any fuel injection system, utilizes a special high-pressure fuel deliver nozzle to inject an ultra-fine mist of fuel into the engine. An electronic control unit uses sensors around the engine to deliver the precise amount of fuel the engine needs, improving response, efficiency and starting. Cub EFI adjusts the fuel metering on-the-fly to compensate for variations in load, speed, fuel, temp and pressure to always feed your engine the perfect charge that it needs for maximum performance at any task.

efi.question: Do EFI engines require less maintenance?
efi.answer: Yes. EFI systems produce cleaner combustion, resulting in a cleaner engine clean engines can go longer between regular oil changes and required major maintenance. We do still recommend a fuel stabilizer for long-term storage to make sure the fuel in the tank stays fresh so you'll be ready to mow with a push of a button next spring.

efi.question: How does EFI benefit me?
efi.answer: EFI technology provides quicker startup, making both hot and cold restarts easier so your equipment will start when you need it most. It also creates a more powerful engine, easier storage, and requires less maintenance.

efi.question: Are EFI engines more resistant to fuel system corrosion and “ethanol damage” so often seen today?
efi.answer: Yes. The fuel system is ethanol-resistant and compatible with gasoline fuels up to E15 (15% ethanol) blends. Unlike carburetors, the EFI system doesn't rely on mechanical components and easy -to-clog jets. Critical EFI components are totally sealed, making the entire system more tolerant to today's common automotive gasoline blends.

efi.question: Does EFI help with fuel efficiency?
efi.answer: Yes. EFI uses up to 25% less fuel versus standard carbureted engines, which means fewer emissions and fewer fill-ups.

efi.question: Does Cub Cadet EFI accept E85?
efi.answer: No. E85 is a blend of gasoline containing mostly ethanol (85% ethanol and 15% gasoline). Operating the engine with E15 or E85 fuel may result in damage to your engine’s carburetor.

efi.question: Does Cub Cadet EFI accept diesel fuel?
efi.answer: No. Use automotive gasoline (unleaded or low leaded to minimize combustion chamber deposits) with a minimum of 87 octane.
